name: AdventureIsland
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: adventure island
des:
Embark on a thrilling treasure-hunting adventure with your friends Ben and his sister Lily!

On Adventure Island there are many obstacles that you must overcome with the right phrase. From shouting "WHAMMO!" to shoot your ship's cannon, to leaping over dangers by saying "WHEE!", you'll have a blast facing all sorts of fun challenges.

Adventurers can go on three different missions, each with their own unique story and rewards. Will you help Captain Seadog assemble his pirate crew again, or lend King Max a hand in rescuing his princess daughter? The choice is yours! Just make sure to collect coins along the way to help Ben's friends, earn new nicknames, and more!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
